subject: Re: [junit] wait between to tests
msgSnippet: ... Thread.sleep() at the beginning of each test would probably help. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416
messageBody:
Shivanjali wrote:

> test1()
> test2()
> are in suite to be executed.
> these are 2 methods in a Junit testclass. how to wait for sometime
> between 2 tests?

Thread.sleep() at the beginning of each test would probably help.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
